dataIdInfo.idPurp: This layer provides an index map that can be used to locate individual scanned map sheets.
dataIdInfo.idAbs: This polygon shapefile is an index to 1:50,000 scale maps of the Kuril Islands, Russia, titled 'Chishima Rett≈ç.' To create this index, footprints were generated using the fishnet tool, and metadata were supplied for the digitizied paper maps by Stanford Unviersity Libraries. After the footprints were created, the shapefile was trimmed and labeled according to the sources.
dataIdInfo.idCredit: Stanford Unviersity Libraries, Stanford Geospatial Center
